text: The Sucha Koli, or Suchcha Koli and Soocha Koli is a subcaste of the Koli caste found in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh. == Origin and distribution == The Sucha Kolis drived their name from word Sachcha which means Pure, or Asal (original) Koli of Himachal Pradesh. Sucha Kolis mostly found in Kutlehar, Kullu, Lambargaon and Kangra regions of the state. == Clans == There are two main clans of Sucha Kolis in the state:, * Kashyap * Shandilya == References == Category:Koli people
title: Sucha Koli
